name: Online AIS decoder
info:
# Online AIS Message Decoder
# 
Go to http://your.own.ip.address:1880/aisdecode then enter an AIS message and click Decode.

The Results Table node can be configured to display more of the decoded information.
Note that there's a bug in that template - it does not display data if the data evaluates to "false" - so if a vessel's course happens to be due North (zero degrees), it will not be displayed.

name: Error table
template:
Original AIS message:{{originalAisMessage}}
Decode error:{{errorInfo}}

name: Main page
template:
Online AIS decoder

Enter one or more AIS messages, then click "Decode".
Example message: !AIVDM,1,1,,B,33P7k`@Oi?wVpv0PB7@=`bw`00pA,0*7B




{{{payload}}}

name: Pre-process results
